ygData.subject: Re: General EQ question
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the clarification.
>
> The Testament of Vanear. It isn't dropped, it's a quest. The quest is very easy, but it requires you to kill a named NPC in High Hold Pass, and the NPC spawns very rarely. The quest begins in Erudin... if you want the full details of the quest, they are on http://everquest.gamestats.com I won't say the details here because some people don't like quest spoilers =)
>
> -Eachann Bronzeleaf
> -Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 9:38 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] General EQ question
